Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This unique offering holds immense value and is tailored specifically to meet your needs and expectations. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it brings, we believe it's worth every penny of the $10000 investment. By accepting this offer, you'll not only secure a valuable asset but also gain access to unparalleled support and resources designed to maximize your return on investment. We look forward to discussing how this product can elevate your business or personal endeavors. Let's embark on this journey together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
